T5.XYRect

This module provides helper functions for working with an object literal that represents a set of xy values that represent the top-left and bottom-right corners of a rectangle respectively.

XYRect Object Literal Format

An XYRect object literal has the following properties. - x1 - The x value for the top left corner - y1 - The y value for the top left corner - x2 - The x value for the bottom right corner - y2 - The y value for the bottom right corner - width - The width of the rect - height - The height of the rect

Functions

center(rect)

Return a xy composite for the center of the rect

copy(rect)

Return a duplicate of the XYRect

diagonalSize(rect)

fromCenter(centerX, centerY, width, height)

init(x1, y1, x2, y2)

Create a new XYRect composite object

intersect(rect1, rect2)

Returns the intersecting rect between the two specified XYRect composites

toString(rect)

union(rect1, rect2)
